## RIDER REVIEWS

* * *

What our customers say

vivianne silver

1 month ago

Best tour ever!!!

Donna Wyatt

1 month ago

Amazing 5 day tour, guides were brilliant

L T

1 month ago

My 2nd tour with Bike Tour Asia. Amazing! The bikes are top notch. The
accommodation is beautiful. Quality tour all round. Highly recommended.

Read more

Alfeegor Gordon

2 months ago

We used BTA recently for a 9 day tour of northern Thailand. The tour was well
organised and we saw and did so many more interesting things than we ever
could’ve on our own. The accommodation and food was of excellent quality and
the bike were newer and mechanically sound. Highly recommended using BTA for
any Asian bike touring.

Read more

Annya Summers

2 months ago

What a great experience with this company for our Chiang Mai 8 day loop with a
support vehicle. Fantastic organisation, bikes were really well maintained (I
rode Kylie Tiger 900). Guide and briefings each morning were a huge help.
Stops for meals well considered and activities were interesting and
breathtaking. We didn't need to do anything but ride and eat! Hotels booked
enroute were beautiful and perfectly located. Roads during out trip were
exciting, challenging and safe. I highly recommend Bike Tour Asia and will
tour with them again! If you'd like to know more, head to my blog, at
https://tribalmoto.com.au/blogs/tribalmoto-news Annya :)

Read more

Andrew Sweaney

2 months ago

Great bikes, great accommodation, fantastic roads and amazing people. Bikes
are newer, well maintained bikes, the staff are very helpful and
accommodating. They'll cater to what you want and the guides are great riders.
Having a support van is awesome. Did a great trip from Chiang Mai, Nan, Chiang
Rai, Golden Triangle, Thaton, stopped for a couple of days in Pai, then around
to Mai Hong Son, Mae Sariang and back to Chiang Mai, 8 days total...if you
like twisties, that's the ride to do. We had an absolute ball...you can find
it cheaper, but for the small difference in price, these guys make it so much
better, well worth it!! Great work guys, we had an absolute ball, thank you!!

Read more

Ali Jomaa

2 months ago

Absolutely Awesome!!! Fantastic team, well organised, great bikes and truly
amazing ride. Thank you Scott, George and the rest of the team for making this
a trip of a life time, can't wait for the next one.

Read more

Edgar Pau

2 months ago

Once in a life time experience and who better to guide us than with Bike Tour
Asia. The administration process was seamless and from the moment we arrived
the excitement began!! Our bikes were high end touring bikes and practically
brand new. Our tour guide George who was with us for the entire trip was
professional, caring and obviously a wonderful rider. We were able to
customise the trip at our own pace and yet managed to cover the itinerary. We
rode around 250-300km per day which was demanding but most enjoyable and
satisfying at the same time. With riding, we visited many places where the
typical tourists were not able to access. Overall we had the most amazing time
and we would highly recommend Bike Tour Asia to any adventurous riders.

Read more

Load More
